body_html:
I'm guessing this is only an issue on later versions of OpenCV? I tried with 2.4 (since that was what the package manager had) and it seems to work fine including standard_ops.h.

Can someone check for me whether it's just #include <atomic> causing the issue in OpenCV 3.1/3.2? In which case this seems like it's an OpenCV issue rather than something TensorFlow can address.

body:
I'm guessing this is only an issue on later versions of OpenCV? I tried with 2.4 (since that was what the package manager had) and it seems to work fine including standard_ops.h.

Can someone check for me whether it's just `#include <atomic>` causing the issue in OpenCV 3.1/3.2? In which case this seems like it's an OpenCV issue rather than something TensorFlow can address.
